CustomField.description: This field will be sent to SAP EM as part of the event tracking interface between SF and SAP EM. This field will denote whether it is a new article or updated status on an article.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field will be sent to SAP EM as part of the event tracking interface between SF and SAP EM. This field will denote whether it is a new article or updated status on an article.
CustomField.label: Event Code
